entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The specified deps.json [...] does not exist. Missing net8.0 in path #35234
  • Add dependency injection support to `IEntityTypeConfiguration` when using `ApplyConfigurationsFromAssembly` #35233
  • Consider solutions for removing the need to specify same cmdline arguments all the time for the tools #35231
    Backlog
  • IDbCommandInterceptor.CommandFailed does not capture all command exceptions #35229

Closed

  • RelationalQueryableMethodTranslatingExpressionVisitor now accepts RelationalQueryCompilationContext and not QueryCompilationContext #35226
  • Try EF Core 9 now! #33030
    Discussions
  • Nullable value type used with coalescing operator in argument to non-nullable aggregate function throws #35227
  • Add a REPL for dotnet-ef #35125
  • Running dotnet-ef migrations bundle in a Azure pipeline #35157

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle comparers for nullable value types in primitive collections #35235
  • See how SqlClient 6 runs #35232
  • [release/9.0] Set environment variables to "Development" when creating DbContext using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #35230
    Servicing-consider

Updated

  • Avoid using `^` and `~` when invalid because of value converters #35124
  • [release/9.0] Prevent owner entity from becoming optional #35222
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0] Add more specific messages when pending model changes are detected #35221
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35228
    Servicing-approved
